transform_def.name: sdMap_Squircle
transform_def.string:
let uv0 = sqrt(square(p_in.x) + square(p_in.y) - square(p_in.x) * square(p_in.y)) / sqrt(square(p_in.x) + square(p_in.y)) uv = p_in * uv0
n = square(p_in.x) + square(p_in.y) s = sign(p_in.x * p_in.y) / sqrt2() * sqrt(n - sqrt(n * (n - 4.0 * square(p_in.x) * square(p_in.y)))) xy = vec2(1.0 / p_in.x, 1.0 / p_in.y) * s in if(switch > 0.0, uv, xy) * weight
